title: Spa, Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances, On-Site Maintenance
posting_body: Visit This Website to See More:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 750 Sq.
We are now offering personalized in-person tours!
In support of preventing the spread of COVID-19, for the health of you, our residents, and community, we ask that you reserve an appointment with our leasing team prior to your arrival.
The Ridgedale features renovated apartment homes in the heart of prestigious Eastside Bellevue.

Nestled in lush greenery and natural landscaping, The Ridgedale showcases spacious floorplans that boast updated kitchens, with stainless appliances, over-sized refrigerators, quartz counter-tops, hardwood-inspired flooring, and modern white cabinetry.
Our community is pet friendly, too!
The Ridgedale is centrally located to Downtown with easy access to I-405, I-90 and 520.

Leisure is at your fingertips, as our community is just minutes away from Kelsey Creek Park, Factoria Market Village, Crossroads Mall, The Bellevue Collection in Downtown Bellevue, and the Bellevue Art Museum.
Your shopping, dining and entertainment options are always abundant.
Whether you are spending a night out at a great local eatery or you prefer to spend a relaxed evening in our clubhouse, you can be certain
The Ridgedale is the perfect place to call home!
We welcome four legged furry friends.
A deposit and rent charge is required for each pet.
